page.title: 02RECREATION
page.content: There is a wide range of water activities,including sailing, wind-surfing and fishing at{Mercers {Park.}Also on{Mercers Farm parascending and micro flying take place.Hang-gliding and aerobatics use the space above as there are no restrictions from{Gatwick Airport,}and the area is lightly populated.Lancelyn squash club in{Nutfield Marsh}has a pool,sauna and a bar.Bird watching is available and many rare butterflies can be found by the sand pits.Nutfield has a cricket club.In the summer holiday an adventure week for local children is held in the grounds of the Hawthorns school. There are several riding stables.Greyhounds are kept and trained at the{Pendene Greyhound {Kennels,}which cover 20 acres.80 dogs are kept. Walking is a popular pastime and there are many public footpaths.
